attributes.action: end tax relief on football clubs who are currently able to deduct debt interest payments from their annual tax bills.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hard up taxpayers should not subsidise loss making football clubs.

It is a crazy state of affairs when government debt is at record levels that the situation is exaggerated by tax payers also having to subsidise deliberately indebted football clubs. 

Debts which the current club owners have frequently incurred when they borrowed to purchase the once profitable clubs in the first place.

Rewarding indebtedness is just not a sane nor sustainable situation.

Please sign the petition now. Then ask your friends to do likewise today.
